adrFormatAddress: 74 Chambers St, New York, NY 10007-1826, USA

originalText.text: Arjan has been my hairstylist for 8 years and he’s a true pro. He always gives me a cut that makes me feel great and look sharp. I walk out of every appointment with a smile. Highly recommend him if you’re after a stylist who consistently delivers top-notch cuts and a feel-good vibe.

text.text: Arjan has been my hairstylist for 8 years and he’s a true pro. He always gives me a cut that makes me feel great and look sharp. I walk out of every appointment with a smile. Highly recommend him if you’re after a stylist who consistently delivers top-notch cuts and a feel-good vibe.

originalText.text: I moved to the area a few years ago and have had Lily doing my highlights and Albert cutting my hair. They each do an amazing job, are extremely personable, and the entire staff is welcoming and friendly. Their online booking makes managing appointments super easy too. I'm EXTREMELY picky when it comes to my hair and was honestly quite nervous to try a new salon in a new neighborhood, but I'm so glad I found this place. Lily and Albert both take the time to listen to what you want and what you're looking for while also providing advice and making any adjustments. If I could rate this salon even higher I would! :)

originalText.text: I was looking for a new place to get my haircut. I tried Tribeca Hair Studio and have not looked back. I had been going to a salon for as long as I can remember, but decided to try a barbering cut with Albert. The cut was great -- exactly what I was looking for -- and Albert's attention to detail is amazing. Very satisfied.

text.text: I was looking for a new place to get my haircut. I tried Tribeca Hair Studio and have not looked back. I had been going to a salon for as long as I can remember, but decided to try a barbering cut with Albert. The cut was great -- exactly what I was looking for -- and Albert's attention to detail is amazing. Very satisfied.

originalText.text: Sawitta was so kind and listened to the style that I requested and proceeded to deep condition my hair, cut and style and blow dry it in precise manner. She is an extremely truly talented individual and will transform your hair. If you have any doubts about cutting your hair a bit shorter don’t worry because she understands the texture of your hair and won’t cut it too short. Sawitta is really mindful about how you will wear your hairstyle after you leave (curly or straight) so she will cut it in that manner. She was amazingly accommodating and when my mom who was visiting NYC from NC who actually found the salon for me also wanted a haircut during the same time as me as walk in requested this she accepted to cut her hair too. You will not believe what an incredible job she did on my mom’s haircut she looks 10 years younger!!! My mom and I had the best time at Tribeca Hair Studio and I cannot recommend their salon enough. The staff was so friendly and helpful. I will definitely go back and highly recommend this salon to my friends and coworkers!!! Thank you for such a memorable experience :)

originalText.text: The stylist did the exact opposite of what I asked for right before I went to an event. Worst shampoo, cut, and blow out I've ever had. I had to run to a friend's place to use their flat iron to look remotely presentable. Yana, the stylist offered to flat iron my hair for an additional 25$ but I didn't trust that she could make the situation any better. Looking forward to the hair salon I normally go to to fix the uneven cut!
